  1. 92/365: Bristol Zoo

    11.04.2011

    Had a good day at Bristol Zoo. The photo above is probably my favourite from the day - I finally got to put my close-up lens thing to good use - and below are some others that I kind of like, but not as much.

  2. 91/365: Offside!

    11.04.2011

    I spent the weekend with my family at a hotel in Wiltshire to celebrate my Dad's 60th birthday.

    This is the best photo I got on the Friday. It's really noisy due to me shooting before setting the camera correctly, but, despite that, I quite like it.

  3. 90/365: Turd polish

    10.04.2011

    Possibly someone's attempt at making an ugly building look a bit better.

  4. 89/365

    10.04.2011

    I came across this on day 88 and decided to go back to get it the day after (I can't really use the words today or yesterday when I'm writing these posts about 2 weeks after the photos were taken.)

    I have no idea what's happened to the top of the picture - the edges of the roof have gone all jaggedy. It's probably something to do with me not knowing how to take a good picture.
